glsa.title: KSirc: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: KSirc is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: KSirc is the default KDE IRC client.

description.p: KSirc fails to check the size of an incoming PRIVMSG string sent from an IRC server during the connection process.

impact.p: A malicious IRC server could send a long PRIVMSG string to the KSirc client causing an assertion failure and the dereferencing of a null pointer, resulting in a crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All KSirc users should upgrade to the latest version:
